plot: Two middle age couples are linked by more than just a lifelong friendship, they are linked by love. It's just a matter of time before they have some explaining to do to their kids.
title: Svatá Ctverice
plot_es: Two middle age couples are linked by more than just a lifelong friendship, they are linked by love. It's just a matter of time before they have some explaining to do to their kids.
plot_en: Two middle age couples are linked by more than just a lifelong friendship, they are linked by love. It's just a matter of time before they have some explaining to do to their kids.
